radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echotexture without focal lesions. Normal common bile duct measuring 3 mm. The pancreas is normal but not well seen. Normal aorta and IVC. Right kidney without hydronephrosis. Gallbladder distended with multiple gallstones, including two in the neck measuring up to 2 cm. No mural thickening or pericholecystic fluid.
